t.x: A device for voice communication or the act of calling. Mobile phones are also called '휴대전화'.
e: I phone / phone call every day.
Phone / Phone call is important in daily life.
Through phone / phone call, I maintain a regular lifestyle.
Making phone / phone call a habit is key to improving quality of life.
